channel.title: CVE Feed for opensearch-project -- security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for opensearch-project -- security

item.title: CVE-2023-25806|2023-03-02T03:04:26.889Z -- opensearch-project -- security
item.description: OpenSearch Security is a plugin for OpenSearch that offers encryption, authentication and authorization. There is an observable discrepancy in the authentication response time between calls where the user provided exists and calls where it does not. This issue only affects calls using the internal basic identity provider (IdP), and not other externally configured IdPs. Patches were released in versions 1.3.9 and 2.6.0, there are no workarounds.
